name: Pong Hu3
description: Pong Hu3 is an arcade-style ping-pong game. Inspired by the classic Pong, it was created as a graduation project for the discipline "Physics for digital games". The game uses Box2d for the physics simulation and SFML for rendering and sounds. It can be played in solo mode against the AI or in local multiplayer mode against another player. The game also features a replay system, in which you can save and rewatch any matches you've played. Pong Hu3 supports up to two controllers, for both solo and multiplayer modes.
